attributes.action: Let Councils Build New Council Houses To Create Jobs & Income For Councils
attributes.additional_details:
Instead Of Pumping Money Into The Private House Builders Market Use The Money Let Councils Build New Council Houses For Rent To Create Jobs and Protect council workers jobs, Plus Create Income For Councils & Any Money Raised From The Sale Of Council Houses Using The Right To Buy Act To Be Used For This Too.
Instead Of Hoping The Private Sector Will Absorb All The Redundent Construction Workers.
